title: Premiere: Britt Margit – Wake Up In New York
body:
Having spent the past few months piecing together her debut album, expected on indie label [Birdland](http://www.

birdlandrecords.com/) next year, **Britt Margit** is gearing up to leave a lasting impact on 2017. This latest taster, a cover of Craig Armstrong’s Wake Up In New York, recorded during a gruelling evening in the studio, focuses the spotlight on her sensational, gripping vocal. Accompanied by a strikingly uncomplicated yet effective video, it’s a poignant representation of the powerful vulnerability that Margit possesses. Check out Wake Up In New York below. Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
